survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Tea Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on subscription-based tea delivery services to understand satisfaction levels and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of teas offered in your subscription?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of teas offered in your subscription?

questions.question_text: How often do you receive your tea subscription delivery?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for custom responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: How often do you receive your tea subscription delivery?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your tea subscription? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key features.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your tea subscription? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your tea subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your tea subscription service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this tea subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this tea subscription service to a friend or colleague?
